title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Chip sector’s gains are fading, but charts say bulls may just be resting up for a big rally
items.description: Charts suggest chip sector is enduring a “time correction,” and it seems likely to eventually be resolved with another rally.

items.title: I want to gift my grandnieces, ages 5 and 10, stocks. How do I make sure they get an equal amount when they turn 18?
items.description: “One child’s portfolio will have an additional five years of growth.”

items.title: ‘Is it a case of them or us?’ We’re in our 40s. Do we retire early in our 50s — or save for our kids’ education?
items.description: “We’re both teachers, with a combined gross income of $210,000.”

items.title: Silver is turning into one of the hottest trades of 2025. Why this veteran investor is targeting $300 in a coming ‘mania’ phase.
items.description: Peter Krauth, author of “The Great Silver Bull,” says silver’s “mania phase” is not far off.

items.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
items.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

items.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
items.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
